text: Ni twampele (Ibrahimajo mwanache jwakuwilanjikwa) Isihaka kwisa soni (chisukulu chakuwilanjikwa) Yaakubu, jwalijose mwa jamanjao twan'jongwele, nombe najo Nuhu twan'jongwele kala (Ibrahima nkanaiche), soni mu wanache wakwe (wa Nuhu twan'jongwele) Daudi, Sulaimana, Ayyubu, Yusufu, Musa ni Haruna, soni iyyoyopeyo niyatukutiji pakwalipila wakolosya
